title: Rediscovering Amazon Civilisations
itunes:title: Rediscovering Amazon Civilisations
itunes:subtitle: Ella Al-Shamahi, explorer, paleoanthropologist, evolutionary biologist and stand-up comic, joined me on the podcast to talk about Amazon Civilisations.
description:
Ella Al-Shamahi, explorer, paleoanthropologist, evolutionary biologist and stand-up comic, joined me on the podcast to talk about Amazon Civilisations.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
